results.query: How can I check my payment status?
results.ground_truth: You can check your payment status by logging into your account dashboard and navigating to the 'Billing' section. Alternatively, you can contact our customer support team with your account number for immediate assistance.
results.prediction: You can check your payment status by logging into your account dashboard and navigating to the "Billing" section. Alternatively, you can contact our customer support team with your account number for immediate assistance.

results.query: What payment methods do you accept?
results.ground_truth: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets including PayPal and Apple Pay.
results.prediction: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets including PayPal and Apple Pay.

results.query: Can I get a refund?
results.ground_truth: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with our service, you can request a full refund within 30 days of your purchase.
results.prediction: Hi there! Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with our service, you can request a full refund within 30 days of your purchase.

results.query: How do I update my billing information?
results.ground_truth: You can update your billing information by going to Account Settings > Billing Information. Make sure to update both your payment method and billing address.
results.prediction: You can update your billing information by going to Account Settings > Billing Information. Make sure to update both your payment method and billing address.

results.query: How do I reset my password?
results.ground_truth: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email. The reset link will expire in 24 hours.
results.prediction: Click on "Forgot Password" on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email. The reset link will expire in 24 hours.

results.query: How do I cancel my subscription?
results.ground_truth: You can cancel your subscription at any time by going to Account Settings > Subscription > Cancel. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
results.prediction: You can cancel your subscription at any time by going to Account Settings > Subscription > Cancel. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

results.query: Is my personal information secure?
results.ground_truth: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal and payment information. We never store your credit card details on our servers.
results.prediction: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal and payment information. We never store your credit card details on our servers.

results.query: Can I have multiple users on one account?
results.ground_truth: Yes, depending on your subscription plan. Basic plans allow 1 user, Professional plans allow up to 5 users, and Enterprise plans support unlimited users.
results.prediction: Yes, depending on your subscription plan. Basic plans allow 1 user, Professional plans allow up to 5 users, and Enterprise plans support unlimited users.

results.query: How do I download my data?
results.ground_truth: You can export your data by going to Account Settings > Data Export. Choose the format you prefer (CSV, JSON, or PDF) and click 'Export Data.'
results.prediction: Go to Account Settings > Data Export. Choose the format you prefer (CSV, JSON, or PDF) and click "Export Data."

results.query: What browsers do you support?
results.ground_truth: We support all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome.
results.prediction: We support all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome.
